translation.en: [kid] Whoaaa! Whoo-hoo!
♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus ♪
-Whoaaa! -Oh, the humanity!
Hold on, everybody.
We're experiencing my favorite thing about air travel: turbulence.
translation.es: ¡Mi cosa favorita del viaje aéreo! ¡La turbulencia!

translation.en: And here comes my second-favorite thing. Wind shear!
translation.es: - No… - Y mi segunda cosa favorita. Las ráfagas.

translation.en: I hope we don't find out what your third-favorite thing is, Ms. Frizzle.
translation.es: ¡No quiero descubrir su tercera cosa favorita!

translation.en: Can't you get us out of this?
Well, here's the challenge, Arnold.
Because this is a hot-air balloon, I can't steer it.
translation.es: Como es un globo aerostático, no puedo girar.

translation.en: I can only make it do three things: go up...
translation.es: Solo puedo hacer tres cosas: subir…

translation.en: Go down...
What's the third thing?
Go down fast!
I knew I should've stayed home today!
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me quedé en casa?

translation.en: Don't say that, Arnold. This is all because of you, remember?
translation.es: No digas eso, Arnoldo. Esto es gracias a ti, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: Happy birthday, Arnold!
I made this card for you.
[Arnold] Hmm. You really captured my essence.
And don't forget about your biggest present.
translation.es: Y no olvides tu mayor regalo.

translation.en: You, Arnold, get to choose... our field trip.
translation.es: Tú, Arnoldo, podrás elegir nuestra excursión.

translation.en: I guess we're staying home today. Even better.
We're headed to the International Balloon Fiesta in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
translation.es: ¡Vamos al Festival de Globos en Albuquerque, Nuevo México!

translation.en: Come on! Whoo-hoo!
-[kids cheering] -[Bus honks]
OK, here we go.
isn't the balloon supposed to be... balloon-y?
translation.es: ¿El globo no debería tener forma de… globo?

translation.en: Where's the helium?
[Ms. Frizzle] No helium in hot-air balloons, Ralphie.
translation.es: El globo aerostático no tiene helio.

translation.en: The clue is in the words "hot" and "air."
No problem. Ralphie's full of that.
OK. First, we put in the air.
Why isn't it rising?
It won't rise until we put in the hot.
translation.es: Porque todavía falta la parte caliente.

translation.en: I remember this.
When you heat something, the molecules move faster!
translation.es: Si calientas algo, las moléculas se mueven más rápido.

translation.en: Fast-moving air molecules will spread apart and fill the balloon!
translation.es: Las moléculas de aire se separan y llenan el globo.

translation.en: And when air molecules spread apart, the air is less dense.
translation.es: Y, cuando se separan, el aire es menos denso.

translation.en: Hot, less-dense air
translation.es: Un aire caliente y menos denso

translation.en: rises above the cooler, denser air outside the balloon.
translation.es: se eleva sobre el aire más frío y denso de afuera.

translation.en: [Jyoti] The hot air rises, taking the balloon along with it!
translation.es: ¡El aire caliente sube y se lleva el globo!

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] OK, class!
-All aboard! -Come on!
-This is amazing! -Full speed ahead!
Full speed? Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
Balloons don't have engines or rockets to push them forward.
translation.es: Los globos no tienen motor ni propulsor.

translation.en: They just go up and down. That's why I love them.
translation.es: Solo suben y bajan. Por eso los amo.

translation.en: Then... how do we go anywhere?
We just drift along on the currents of air,
translation.es: Nos llevarán las corrientes de aire.

translation.en: like floating down a lazy river on a fully inspected, totally leakproof raft.
translation.es: Como si flotáramos por un río calmo en una balsa muy segura.

translation.en: Kick back and relax for... the best field trip ever!
translation.es: Relájense para disfrutar… la mejor excursión del mundo.

translation.en: You said hot-air balloons were quiet and gentle drifting on currents of air.
translation.es: Dijiste que los globos eran calmos y se movían por la corriente.

translation.en: How could I know we'd hit a thunderstorm?
Oh, I don't know... by checking your forecast?
Don't worry! We'll be fine as long as we don't get hit by...
translation.es: ¡Tranquilos! Estaremos bien mientras no nos dé…

translation.en: [kids] Lightning!
Dude, what just happened?
Where did the sun go?
Is it just the three of us? Where's everybody else?
And what's up with the Bus?
Bigger question: where are we?
-Uh, guys? -[Ms. Frizzle singing] Something funny is happening...
♪ We're on a clear blue sea in Waikiki ♪
translation.es: Estamos en el mar azul de Waikiki.

translation.en: ♪ But something funny's going on with me ♪ Kapow!
translation.es: Pero me está pasando algo raro.

translation.en: ♪ You're hangin' with the Frizz ♪
Get it? Hangin'?
Because we're suspended from a hot-air balloon, of course.
translation.es: Porque estamos flotando en un globo.

translation.en: Also... [snorts] We're in Hawaii! [laughs]
♪ We're on a clear blue sea in Waikiki... ♪
translation.es: Estamos en el mar azul de Waikiki.

translation.en: What are you guys doing?
Dancing! It's super catchy!
♪ You're hangin' with the Frizz ♪
Intense. That was crazy loud.
You mean the storm or Arnold's screams?
translation.es: ¿La tormenta o los gritos de Arnoldo?

translation.en: Hey... Where is Arnold?
And everyone else?
I know this coastline.
Last time I was here, I faced one of my most death-defying adventures,
translation.es: Aquí enfrenté una de mis aventuras más difíciles:

translation.en: the Buried Mummy of Chan-Chan.
Upside is, I know how long it takes to dig out of a tomb with nothing but a belt buckle and a button.
translation.es: Pero aprendí a salir de una tumba con una hebilla de cinturón y un botón.

translation.en: Welcome to Peru, kids!
-Peru? -Button?
But what about the Balloon Fiesta?
Balloon Fiesta? [groans]
Where's the adventure in that?
Let's take this baby to the Andes Mountains and surf some serious air currents!
translation.es: Vamos a los Andes a surfear corrientes de aire.

translation.en: That's an adventure!
-Hold on to your shirts... -[flames roar]
[Ms. Frizzle] Yeah!
DA! Liz! Are you all right?
Wait... Am I all right?
I've lost the ability to see the rest of the class!
translation.es: ¡Perdí la capacidad de ver a los demás!

translation.en: -Oh, no! I'm class blind! -No, you're not.
translation.es: ¡Estoy ciego de clase! Claro que no.

translation.en: -They're not here. It's just us. -[Arnold shudders]
This is like my recurring dream of a field trip descending into total chaos.
translation.es: Es como cuando sueño que la excursión se descontrola.

translation.en: Only, oh, wait! That dream is real. And it's every single trip!
translation.es: Pero… ese sueño es real. ¡Pasa en cada excursión!

translation.en: I admit this is stranger than usual, Arnold, but we'll figure it out.
translation.es: Es más raro de lo normal, pero lo resolveremos.

translation.en: How? Ms. Frizzle is gone.
I'll never get to tell her how much I actually learned from her.
translation.es: Nunca podré decirle cuánto aprendí de ella.

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] There's much more to learn, Arnold,
like how not to talk about people when they aren't there.
translation.es: Como no hablar de la gente en su ausencia.

translation.en: [stammers] Ms. Frizzle?
Yes, and that is clearly the iconic lighthouse of Peggy's Cove, Nova Scotia.
translation.es: Sí, y ese es el gran faro de Peggy's Cove, en Nueva Escocia.

translation.en: Nova Scotia, Canada? What happened during the storm
translation.es: ¿Nueva Escocia, Canadá? ¿Cómo terminamos al otro lado del continente desde Albuquerque?

translation.en: that we ended up on the opposite side of the continent from Albuquerque?
translation.es: ¿Cómo terminamos al otro lado del continente desde Albuquerque?

translation.en: When lightning struck the Bus, the power surge caused a rupture.
translation.es: Cuando el rayo le dio al autobús, provocó una ruptura.

translation.en: The Bus has clearly been split and separated.
Where's everyone else?
An excellent question, Dorothy Ann.
Class, what would be the best way to find them?
Well, if the other FrizzPad is with the other part of the Bus...
translation.es: Si el otro Rizo-Pad está con la otra parte del autobús…

translation.en: We should be able to track them!
Good thinking, you two.
I would also have accepted "Scream their names as loudly as we can."
-This FrizzPad's on the fritz! -[beeping]
There we go.
I think we found them, but... could this be right?
translation.es: Creo que aquí están, pero… ¿Cómo puede ser?

translation.en: The other half of the Bus is in...
Peru?
Guys! Someone's calling us! Please let it be a rescue team!
translation.es: - ¡Alguien nos llama! - ¡Que sea un equipo de rescate!

translation.en: Wanda! You're OK!
-Arnold! Am I glad to see you! -Hey, Arn!
-We were starting to get worried. -Where's the rest of the class?
We're in Nova Scotia, Canada, but it's just DA and me.
translation.es: Estamos en Nueva Escocia, Canadá. Pero solo estoy con Dorotea.

translation.en: Hold on! A part of the Bus is also in... -Hawaii! -[device beeps]
translation.es: Esperen. Otra parte del autobús está en… ¡Hawái!

translation.en: Keesha!
Am I glad to see you guys! I need help immediately!
I've got a situation over here.
Carlos, Ralphie and Ms. Frizzle won't stop acting silly,
translation.es: Carlos, Rafa y la señorita Rizos actúan como tontos.

translation.en: even more than usual.
But... that's not possible!
Oh, I assure you, it is very possible!
No. How can Ms. Frizzle be with you when she's here with us in Peru right now?
translation.es: No. ¿Cómo está la Srta. Rizos allá si está aquí en Perú?

translation.en: -See? -Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo!
You know how they say you can never have too much of a good thing?
translation.es: ¿Vieron que dicen que, si algo es bueno, nunca sobra?

translation.en: Well, we all have a Frizzle!
Surprise.
[laughs] You get a Frizzle! She gets a Frizzle! We all get Frizzles!
translation.es: ¡Tú tienes una Rizos! ¡Ella también! ¡Todos tenemos una Rizos!

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle split into three? Ah! This is all starting to make sense now.
translation.es: - ¿La señorita Rizos se dividió en tres? - Empieza a tener sentido.

translation.en: Really? Uh, according to my research...
Oh, who am I kidding? There's no research to support this! This is impossible!
Improbable, but not impossible, Dorothy Ann.
This isn't my first split.
Last time I experienced a magic rupture, I fractured into three parts as well.
translation.es: En mi última división mágica, también me dividí en tres.

translation.en: What you're seeing is only one-third of me.
translation.es: Lo que ven es solo un tercio de mí.

translation.en: There's also the wacky, goofy, silly side of me.
translation.es: También está mi lado más tonto y alocado.

translation.en: I call her "The Frizz."
[laughs] Wacky, goofy side? Never met her!
She sounds pretty awesome, though, eh? Eh?
And I'm the daring, adventurous side. Fiona!
translation.es: Yo soy el lado osado y aventurero: ¡Fiona!

translation.en: Inconceivable! Our Frizz just jumped out of the balloon!
-What? -[laughs] Classic me!
And then there's this part of me.
translation.es: Y luego está esta parte de mí.

translation.en: The reliable teacher who only wants to observe and learn from a safe distance.
translation.es: La que quiere observar y aprender a la distancia.

translation.en: Music to my ears.
Good. Then please sit.
Sitting is 77.84% safer than standing.
translation.es: Es un 77.84 % más seguro que estar de pie.

translation.en: And swinging is 100% more fun than sitting!
translation.es: ¡Y balancearse es un 100 % más divertido que sentarse!

translation.en: Uh, shouldn't we be finding a way to get all three Frizzles back together?
translation.es: ¿No deberíamos averiguar cómo reunir a las Rizos?

translation.en: You mean, "Shouldn't we be finding a way to get all three Frizzles back together in time?"
translation.es: O mejor: ¿no deberíamos averiguar cómo reunir a las Rizos… a tiempo?

translation.en: In time? What do you mean, in time?
[Ms. Frizzle] Observe.
What... what's happening?
Hey! Would someone give her a hand?
[laughs] Hey, nice one! -Whoa! -[thuds]
No one stands alone, class. Especially when they've been split into three parts.
translation.es: Nadie está solo, clase. Sobre todo, si se divide en tres.

translation.en: Meaning?
Yeah, unforch, the, uh, Frizzle fragments can't survive on their own.
translation.es: Es una pena: divididas, las Rizos no sobreviven.

translation.en: I'm fading away, and so are the others.
That's right. If we're not reunited soon, all three of us will disappear.
translation.es: Eso. Si no nos reunimos pronto, desapareceremos.

translation.en: You mean, you'll f-f-fade away f-f-forever?
Correct. You're developing excellent comprehension skills, Arnold.
translation.es: Correcto. Estás desarrollando una comprensión excelente.

translation.en: We just need to work on your delivery. You'll fade away forever?
Oh, much better.
We can't let that happen! We gotta reunite all three Frizzles! We have to do it quick!
translation.es: ¡No podemos permitirlo! ¡Hay que reunir a las Rizos! ¡Rápido!

translation.en: Quickly. Adverb!
-Quickly! -Hmm.
It would make sense to get back to Albuquerque where the separation started.
translation.es: Quizá deberíamos ir a Albuquerque, donde se separaron.

translation.en: Albuquerque-ly!
What an excellent deduction, Dorothy Ann.
I'll try to coordinate with the other groups!
First-rate plan, but please stay away from the sides
translation.es: Gran plan, pero, por favor, aléjate de los bordes.

translation.en: while pacing around the basket. Safety first.
translation.es: Gran plan, pero, por favor, aléjate de los bordes. La seguridad primero.

translation.en: What is she even doing?
-Unsure. -But it looks like fun!
Yaaaay!
Watch out!
-[kids gasp] -Oh, no!
-Now what? -We gotta pull her up!
Ptooey! I got a better idea!
[Tim] How is that a better idea?
I'll show you. I'm in a river, and so are you!
translation.es: Ya verán. Estoy en un río, ¡y ustedes también!

translation.en: Water currents are like air currents, kids!
translation.es: Las corrientes de agua son como las aéreas.

translation.en: Picture the air moving you along like this river is pushing me!
translation.es: El aire que las empuja es como este río.

translation.en: Remarkable. She jumped into a river to teach us a lesson!
translation.es: Extraordinario. ¡Saltó a un río para darnos una lección!

translation.en: ♪ Here we go! ♪
Water currents push me.
translation.es: La corriente de agua me empuja.

translation.en: Air currents push the balloon and you! Whoo-hoo!
translation.es: ¡Y a ustedes, las corrientes de aire!

translation.en: -[Jyoti] Oh, no! -Ms. Frizzle, stop looking at us!
-Look in front of you! -[all] There's a waterfall!
[Tim] We have to get Ms. Frizzle out of there!
translation.es: ¡Hay que sacar a la Srta. Rizos!

translation.en: The Bus usually has the best gadgets. Let's see what we've got here.
translation.es: El autobús suele ser útil. A ver qué tenemos.

translation.en: -Uh... this one! -[button beeps]
How did I miss? I was aiming right for her!
We have to take the air current into account.
So try aiming a little behind her!
Look in front of you!
It's coming up fast!
[Ms. Frizzle] That's why they call 'em rapids!
We've got her!
Tasty save!
So, kids, while I was heading toward a waterfall, what did you learn?
translation.es: ¿Qué aprendieron mientras iba a la cascada?

translation.en: The Bus has a magic gross lizard tongue?
You learned that the balloon is riding air currents, the rivers of the sky!
translation.es: Que el globo va sobre corrientes de aire, que son los ríos del cielo.

translation.en: -[kids gasp] -Oh, no!
translation.es: que son los ríos del cielo. ¡No!

translation.en: Whoa! Stealth mode! [laughs] Cool!
We have to get to Albuquerque ASAP.
Then we need to head north as fast as we can!
translation.es: Entonces, ¡hay que ir al norte ya!

translation.en: Arnold said the balloon only moves forward on air currents.
translation.es: Bien, el globo avanza con la corriente.

translation.en: But you can't steer to find one, you can only go up and down.
translation.es: Pero no podemos doblar y montarla. Solo subir y bajar.

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle, how do we find a current to ride?
I'm sorry, Keesha! I can't talk right now. -I'm on a very important call. -[thunder rumbles]
translation.es: Perdón, no puedo hablar. Tengo una llamada importante.

translation.en: -Yes, I'll hold. -Seriously?
As serious as that storm behind you.
[splutters] I'm so sorry about that. It's bananas around here.
translation.es: Lo siento, esto es una locura.

translation.en: No way I want to go through another storm.
translation.es: No quiero pasar por otra tormenta.

translation.en: Yeah. We might get hit with lightning again, and I might split into my three main parts:
translation.es: Podría darnos otro rayo, y podría dividirme en tres partes:

translation.en: Ralphie, Awesome Ralphie and Super Awesome Ralphie.
translation.es: Rafa, Rafa Fabuloso y Rafa Superfabuloso.

translation.en: The world couldn't take it.
Hello? You're fading out! Oh, wait, that's me.
translation.es: - Sería demasiado. - ¿Hola? ¡Te pierdo! No, soy yo.

translation.en: She's fading? We have to find a way out of this!
The only thing I know how to do on this balloon is to go up and down.
translation.es: Lo único que sé hacer aquí es subir y bajar.

translation.en: Which is it?
Maybe we can see a way out from higher up.
Good thinking, Carlos!
Turning up the heat makes the air inside the balloon spread out.
translation.es: Si subimos el calor, el aire se expande.

translation.en: Spreading out makes the air less dense.
And less-dense air in the balloon means... we go up!
translation.es: Y, si el aire es menos denso, subimos.

translation.en: Whoa! We're picking up speed!
We must have drifted into a major air current.
translation.es: Debimos caer en una gran corriente.

translation.en: Yeah! A major air current that's heading towards California.
translation.es: Sí, una gran corriente que se dirige a California.

translation.en: We're going to take Hollywood by storm.
-[thunder crashes] -Specifically that storm!
We've caught a southwesterly air current. We're headed in the right direction.
translation.es: Tomamos una corriente sudoeste. - Vamos bien. - ¿Sí?

translation.en: Really? Wow! That's great!
I can finally kick back and relax for my birthday.
translation.es: Por fin puedo relajarme en mi cumpleaños.

translation.en: Relax? There's no relaxing here.
There's too much to learn!
Now give me back the FrizzPad, pretty please.
Dorothy Ann, here's your homework to complete on weather patterns.
translation.es: Dorotea, tu tarea para el hogar.

translation.en: How can we do homework when we're not even home?
Good point, Arnold. Let's just call it "balloon work."
translation.es: Buen punto. Es "tarea para el globo".

translation.en: -Don't you just love a... -[kids scream]
We need to find an air current that's going northwest towards Albuquerque!
translation.es: Necesitamos una corriente que vaya al noroeste.

translation.en: How do we do that?
[Ms. Frizzle] Feeling a little pressure, Tim?
So is the balloon. Air pressure, that is! Uh-oh!
translation.es: ¿Sientes la presión? El globo también. Presión del aire, claro.

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle!
And today's in-flight movie is a showing of the award-winning... -Whoa! -[kids gasp]
translation.es: Y la película a bordo de hoy es la galardonada…

translation.en: Hey! Who's pulling my leg... off?
-Whoa... -This is seriously strange! What happened to your leg?
translation.es: Esto es muy raro. ¿Qué le pasó en la pierna?

translation.en: And what movie were you going to show?
What? Too soon?
A headless teacher?
Why can't anything be normal?
Ms. Frizzle! Look out!
Oh, wait. She probably can't hear me.
Why aren't you doing your balloon work? Don't you want to get ahead?
We got a head when yours came back! It was so weird!
Your head was gone for such a long time.
translation.es: Su cabeza desapareció un buen rato.

translation.en: Then my time is indeed running short.
translation.es: Entonces, se me acaba el tiempo.

translation.en: All the more reason to get your studies done.
translation.es: Con más razón: hagan la tarea.

translation.en: I can't grade your work if I'm not around to see it.
translation.es: No puedo corregirla si no la veo.

translation.en: But, Ms. Frizzle, I really think we need to focus on Albuquerque!
translation.es: Señorita Rizos, ¡tenemos que pensar en Albuquerque!

translation.en: Trust me, Arnold. Doing your balloon work is the safest course of action.
translation.es: Confía en mí. La tarea para el globo es lo más seguro.

translation.en: And isn't that what you want, to be safe and calm?
-But how is homework... -Uh-uh-uh!
translation.es: Pero la tarea para el ho…

translation.en: ...uh, I mean balloon work, going to help us?
translation.es: Perdón, para el globo. ¿De qué servirá?

translation.en: You'll find the books on this balloon are extremely relevant.
translation.es: Los libros de este globo son muy relevantes.

translation.en: Read aloud, please.
-[screams] -Whoa! Holographic books!
[chuckles] Right... holographic books.
"Just like the burners on our balloon, the Sun warms the Earth's air.
translation.es: "Como los quemadores del globo, el Sol calienta el aire de la Tierra.

translation.en: But it warms up some parts of the Earth more, like near the Equator,
translation.es: Pero calienta más algunas zonas, como el ecuador,

translation.en: and less in other parts, like the North and South Poles."
translation.es: y menos otras, como los polos".

translation.en: [DA] "That causes a difference in air pressure
that would start air moving from the Equator to the poles and back again."
translation.es: hace que el aire se mueva entre el ecuador y los polos".

translation.en: Well read, you two. Thank you.
Hey, welcome back, Lefty!
How can she be so calm?
Especially when we're under so much pressure!
Ah, pressure! Yeah, that reminds me.
Tim, you make a great balloon.
Uh... why is this happening? And why do I feel so full?
translation.es: ¿Por qué pasa esto? ¿Por qué me siento tan lleno?

translation.en: Because of the pressure from all that air squeezed together inside you.
translation.es: Por la presión de todo ese aire apretado dentro de ti.

translation.en: What happens when you really let the pressure out?
-[air splutters] -[girls] Tim!
What? I'm a balloon!
The air rushes outside to where the air pressure is lower!
translation.es: ¡El aire sale adonde la presión es más baja!

translation.en: Maybe that's what makes air currents,
air rushing from places with high pressure to low pressure!
translation.es: el aire que va de la presión alta a la presión baja.

translation.en: So if we find an air current moving in the right direction...
...and we raise and lower the balloon at the right time to put ourselves in its path...
translation.es: Y subimos y bajamos el globo para meternos en su camino…

translation.en: ...we'll catch the current!
Fire it up!
[Jyoti] It's working! We're moving!
Looks like we're headed northwest to Albuquerque.
Fortuitous!
-I'm starting to think we got this! -[air splutters]
-[Tim] Whoa! -Oh, no! Tim!
[screams] I wanna be a balloon again!
[Ms. Frizzle] Gotcha!
-[thuds] -Let's never do that again!
And you won't have to 'cause you've had your turn as a balloon.
translation.es: No hará falta, porque ya hiciste de globo.

translation.en: Ladies, who's next?
[Carlos] That storm is moving fast. But then, so are we.
translation.es: La tormenta avanza rápido, pero nosotros también.

translation.en: I know, and at least we're going more or less in the right direction.
translation.es: Ya sé. ¿Al menos vamos en el sentido correcto?

translation.en: Found it!
Awww! I was hoping the lightning had split my lunch into three, too.
translation.es: Esperaba que el rayo hubiera dividido mi almuerzo en tres.

translation.en: [chuckles] Hungry, are ya?
Aren't we too high up in the air to go fishing?
And how can you catch anything at this speed? We're going, like, 112 kilometers per hour!
translation.es: ¿Y qué podrá pescar a esta velocidad? ¡Vamos como a 112 km/h!

translation.en: That's 70 miles an hour, but it sounds more impressive in metric.
translation.es: Son 70 millas por hora, pero así no parece tanto.

translation.en: Whoa! I got somethin'!
Actually, it feels like it might be... Whoa! This might be something!
translation.es: ¡Tengo algo! De hecho, parece que… ¡Esto podría ser algo!

translation.en: Almost... got it.
-[object whooshes] -Whoa! What is it?
[Ralphie] It's your phone!
[Ms. Frizzle] Don't be silly, Ralphie. [snorts] It's a pineapple! That can only mean one thing!
translation.es: Qué tonto, Rafa. Es una piña. Solo puede significar una cosa.

translation.en: That you found the weirdest fishing hole of all time?
translation.es: ¿Que es la pesca más rara del mundo?

translation.en: We must be in... the Pineapple Express!
translation.es: Debe ser… ¡"el expreso de la piña"!

translation.en: What's the Pineapple Express?
It's a Hawaiian special delivery service. Let me show you what I'm talking about.
translation.es: Un servicio de entregas hawaiano. Les mostraré.

translation.en: -Going up! -[flames roar]
[Keesha] Wow! We're so high up!
And you'd think we'd have better reception.
Hello, room service? Would you send up a room?
translation.es: Esperaba mejor señal. ¿Servicio al cuarto? ¿Nos envían un cuarto?

translation.en: Ohh! What? Can't you see that's funny? Here, try these.
translation.es: ¿Qué? ¿No le ven la gracia? Pruébense esto.

translation.en: I can't tell if this is serious or just seriously weird.
translation.es: No sé si esto es grave o gravemente raro.

translation.en: Whoa! Check it out, Keesha!
These glasses let you actually see the air currents moving through the sky!
translation.es: ¡Con estos anteojos se ven las corrientes de aire!

translation.en: [Carlos] That air current is massive, like a river of air!
translation.es: Miren esa corriente, parece un río de aire.

translation.en: Exactly. People call that river of air the Pineapple Express.
translation.es: Exacto. A ese río de aire le dicen "el expreso de la piña".

translation.en: [Ralphie] That thing is way bigger than a normal river!
translation.es: ¡Es mucho más grande que un río normal!

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] Atmospheric rivers can be over 100 miles wide and over 1,000 miles long!
translation.es: Los ríos atmosféricos pueden medir 100 millas de ancho y 1000 de largo.

translation.en: Or over 160 kilometers wide and over 1,609 kilometers long.
translation.es: O más de 160 km de ancho y más de 1600 de largo.

translation.en: You're right, it does sound more impressive in metric.
This one goes all the way from Hawaii to California. Wow!
translation.es: Este va desde Hawái hasta California.

translation.en: And it carries storms and rain...
And all sorts of other weather.
Weather from Hawaii can go to California? That's crazy!
translation.es: ¿El clima de Hawái puede ir a California? Qué locura.

translation.en: So... the whole planet is connected.
translation.es: Entonces, todo el planeta está conectado.

translation.en: Air currents carry weather from one part of the Earth to another!
translation.es: Las corrientes llevan el clima de una zona a otra.

translation.en: Bingo! Oh, wait, back up. Not bingo yet.
I still need one more group scream from you all to get the full row.
So, the storm's been following us because it's in the same atmospheric river as we are!
translation.es: La tormenta nos sigue porque va en el mismo río que nosotros.

translation.en: Yup. That big air current is carrying a ton of moisture from the tropics to the West Coast.
translation.es: Sí, esa corriente lleva la humedad de los trópicos a la costa oeste.

translation.en: Once this "river" hits land, the water vapor will cool...
translation.es: Cuando el río llegue a tierra, el vapor se enfriará…

translation.en: And make rain!
So it sounds like we can ride this sky river back to the West Coast!
translation.es: ¡Podemos ir en este río hasta la costa oeste!

translation.en: Yep! As soon as we get into the current.
translation.es: ¡Sí! En cuanto lleguemos a la corriente.

translation.en: -Going down! -[kids] Whoaaaa!
[Ms. Frizzle] Bingo!
[groans] The FrizzPad is still acting up! I can't call the other two groups to check in.
translation.es: ¡El Rizo-Pad sigue andando mal! No puedo llamar a los otros dos grupos.

translation.en: But I can see them on the map.
translation.es: Pero sí los veo en el mapa.

translation.en: And the other two balloons are making their way to Albuquerque! Yes!
translation.es: ¡Y los otros dos globos van a Albuquerque! ¡Sí!

translation.en: Excellent! We have a real shot at saving Ms. Frizzle, Arnold!
Then this birthday trip might be OK after all!
translation.es: ¡Y quizá el viaje de cumpleaños no esté tan mal!

translation.en: Safety first, Arnold. No jumping on the balloon.
translation.es: La seguridad, Arnoldo. No se salta en el globo.

translation.en: Now here, put these on and get back to your studies. Life vests?
translation.es: - Pónganse esto y sigan estudiando. - ¿Chalecos salvavidas?

translation.en: Those are for water and we're flying completely over dry land.
translation.es: Son para el agua. Estamos sobrevolando tierra.

translation.en: Salutem primum, that's my motto. It means "Safety first."
translation.es: Salutem primum. Ese es mi lema. "La seguridad primero".

translation.en: Liz, I have a vest for you too!
Onward and westward to Albuquerque!
translation.es: Hacia adelante, al oeste, a Albuquerque.

translation.en: [Ralphie] Wow! All that rain made it from Hawaii to California.
translation.es: Miren cuánta lluvia llegó de Hawái a California.

translation.en: [Carlos] Just like us.
We rode the same air current as the storm. It's all connected.
translation.es: Usamos la misma corriente. ¡Todo está conectado!

translation.en: Now we just have to connect our Frizzle fragments.
translation.es: Hay que conectar a las Rizos.

translation.en: On to Albuquerque!
-Are we there yet? -[Ms. Frizzle] Arnold.
-[screams] -We use the buddy system here.
translation.es: Arnoldo. Trabajamos de a dos. ¿Y tu pareja?

translation.en: Where's your buddy?
translation.es: Trabajamos de a dos. ¿Y tu pareja?

translation.en: There's only one other kid on the whole balloon!
translation.es: ¡Solo hay otra niña en el globo!

translation.en: Sorry, Liz. One kid and one lizard.
translation.es: Lo siento, Lag. Una niña y un lagarto.

translation.en: -What? Why? -[Ms. Frizzle] Safety first, Arnold!
You'll all be buddies. Please take a seat.
translation.es: Irán los tres juntos. Toma asiento.

translation.en: I'll be over there grading papers.
What papers?
The two essays she made me write on prevailing winds.
translation.es: Los que me pidió sobre los vientos.

translation.en: They're for extra credit! Anyway, I'm sure Ms. Frizzle knows what she's doing.
translation.es: Dan puntos extra. Seguro sabe lo que hace.

translation.en: Are you? This Ms. Frizzle is afraid to take chances, make mistakes.
translation.es: ¿Sí? Esta señorita Rizos teme arriesgarse y equivocarse.

translation.en: And something tells me she doesn't like getting messy.
translation.es: Y algo me dice que no le gusta ensuciarse.

translation.en: We might need to save her from herself.
translation.es: - Quizá debamos salvarla de sí misma. - ¿Cómo?

translation.en: -But how? -Let's see where we are.
translation.es: - Quizá debamos salvarla de sí misma. - ¿Cómo? Veamos dónde estamos.

translation.en: -[beeps] -Oh, no!
translation.es: Veamos dónde estamos. ¡No! ¡Dice que estamos cerca de Ontario, Canadá!

translation.en: This says we're near Ontario, Canada!
translation.es: ¡No! ¡Dice que estamos cerca de Ontario, Canadá!

translation.en: That's way off course from Albuquerque!
No! How did that happen?
[Arnold] Um, New Mexico is this way!
We have to find a different air current and change course, fast!
translation.es: Hay que encontrar otra corriente y cambiar el rumbo. - ¡Rápido! - ¡Arnoldo! ¿Qué haces?

translation.en: Arnold! What are you doing?
I'm taking chances and getting messy-y-y!
And that's why we wear life jackets.
translation.es: Y para eso está el chaleco.

translation.en: I heard all the commotion and lowered the balloon.
translation.es: Oí la conmoción y bajé el globo.

translation.en: Salutem primum, remember?
Uh... thanks?
Are we going to go back up in the sky?
Oh, absolutely not, Dorothy Ann.
From here on out, we're sticking much closer to the ground.
translation.es: Ahora seguiremos más cerca del suelo.

translation.en: But don't we have to go up to make it to Albuquerque before you fade away?
translation.es: ¿No hay que subir para llegar antes de que desaparezca?

translation.en: Probably. But I am not going to risk losing a student again. So unprofessional!
translation.es: Quizá, pero no me arriesgaré a perder a un alumno. Es poco profesional.

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle? Why are we in Ontario?
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos en Ontario? Nos desviamos mucho.

translation.en: -We're way off course. -Excellent question, Arnold.
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos en Ontario? Nos desviamos mucho. Gran pregunta, Arnoldo.

translation.en: You see, the map is flat, but the Earth is not.
translation.es: El mapa es plano, pero la Tierra no.

translation.en: The air doesn't move in a straight line. Since the Earth is round and always rotating...
translation.es: El aire no se mueve en línea recta. Como la Tierra es redonda y rota…

translation.en: [Arnold] Air currents curve! [Ms. Frizzle] Correct! It's called the Coriolis effect.
translation.es: - ¡Las corrientes se curvan! - Sí. El efecto Coriolis.

translation.en: The Coriolis effect?
Yes! It was in the homework.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Estaba en la tarea para el hogar.

translation.en: -Ahem? -I mean "balloon work."
If the Earth stood still, air could flow straight north and south.
translation.es: Si la Tierra no girara, el aire fluiría en línea recta.

translation.en: But since the Earth turns, it makes the air currents curve.
translation.es: Pero gira, así que las corrientes se curvan.

translation.en: Coriolis!
Air currents in the northern hemisphere are always pulled to the right
translation.es: Las corrientes del norte se curvan a la derecha

translation.en: and in the southern hemisphere, they're pulled to the left.
translation.es: y, las del sur, a la izquierda.

translation.en: So, since we're in the northern hemisphere, we're getting pulled to the right.
translation.es: Entonces, como estamos en el norte, nos movemos a la derecha.

translation.en: We started in Nova Scotia, trying to go straight to Albuquerque.
translation.es: Tratamos de ir derecho de Nueva Escocia a Albuquerque.

translation.en: But because air currents curve, we got pulled to the right towards Ontario.
translation.es: Pero, por las curvas, nos movimos a la derecha, hacia Ontario.

translation.en: Very good, Arnold. That was a rewarding teachable moment, don't you think?
translation.es: Muy bien, Arnoldo. Qué momento de aprendizaje, ¿no?

translation.en: But we don't need teachable moments.
We need to find a current that's going the right way!
The safe way is the right way, Arnold.
translation.es: El camino seguro es el indicado.

translation.en: Is it?
Incredible. Fiona Frizzle is literally flipping out.
translation.es: Increíble: Fiona Rizos vuela mientras vuela.

translation.en: I'm tired of being cooped up in this balloon! I want to do something extreme!
translation.es: ¡Me hartó el encierro! ¡Quiero hacer algo extremo!

translation.en: -Ms. Frizzle! -No!
I want to ride a killer whale! I want to take a selfie with Big Foot!
translation.es: ¡Quiero montar una orca! ¡Tomarme una selfi con Pie Grande!

translation.en: I want to climb Kilimanjaro on my hands!
How far are we from Albuquerque?
We've been going straight north for a while, so I bet we're...
translation.es: Hace rato que vamos directo al norte, así que…

translation.en: -[beeps] -This can't be right!
translation.es: Hace rato que vamos directo al norte, así que… No puede ser. Dice que estamos en…

translation.en: This says we're in...
translation.es: No puede ser. Dice que estamos en…

translation.en: Alabama?!
[Wanda] What? How did we go this far east?
I thought we were going north.
-Perplexing! -[phone rings]
-[beeps] -Keesha! Arnold!
-How are you guys doing? -We're almost to Arizona!
translation.es: ¡Rita! ¡Arnoldo! ¿Cómo van? - ¡Ya casi llegamos a Arizona! - No.

translation.en: -[Carlos] No, we aren't. -What?
Sad but true. We're drifting up the coast of California.
translation.es: Es cierto. Seguimos en la costa de California.

translation.en: And we're nowhere near because I fell out of the basket
translation.es: Nosotros seguimos lejos: me caí del cesto

translation.en: and Ms. Frizzle will only fly a few feet off the ground!
translation.es: ¡y la Srta. Rizos no quiere subir mucho!

translation.en: We have problems here, too.
We started out heading straight north, but somehow we're hundreds of miles off track.
translation.es: Íbamos directo al norte, pero terminamos desviándonos.

translation.en: That's because air currents curve. It's the Coriolis effect.
translation.es: Es porque las corrientes se curvan. Es el efecto Coriolis. ¿No, Srta. Rizos?

translation.en: Right, Ms. Frizzle?
translation.es: Es el efecto Coriolis. ¿No, Srta. Rizos?

translation.en: -Good point, Arnold. -Ms. Frizzle!
Hey, by the way, what's a gust of wind's favorite color?
translation.es: ¿Qué le dijo una corriente a otra?

translation.en: -Blue! [laughs] -Whoa! Frizz, come back!
I'll be here all night! No, I won't.
translation.es: Estaré toda la noche. O no.

translation.en: This is not funny!
[Ms. Frizzle] Yes, it is!
Was that it? Are they gone forever?
Guys, our Frizzle just disappeared!
-[static crackles] -[Keesha] No! Not now! The call dropped!
Guys?
We're on our own.
No FrizzPad and no Frizz?
According to my calculations, it's time to panic!
translation.es: Según mis cálculos, ¡hay que entrar en pánico!

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle, you're back!
-You faded all the way out! -For a full three minutes!
We have to go faster!
We've got to get back up in the sky before we run out of time!
translation.es: ¡Hay que subir antes de que sea tarde!

translation.en: And I'll try to figure out when that will be.
I'm sorry, class, but staying low is the only safe course.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero volar bajo es la única ruta segura.

translation.en: Salutem primum--
No! The time for being safe is over!
translation.es: - Salutem primum… - ¡No! ¡Ya no podemos ser precavidos!

translation.en: If we're going to save you, we have to take chances,
translation.es: Si queremos salvarla, ¡habrá que correr riesgos, equivocarnos y ensuciarnos!

translation.en: make some big mistakes and get really messy!
translation.es: ¡habrá que correr riesgos, equivocarnos y ensuciarnos!

translation.en: Whoa! Arnold!
I'm sorry, Ms. Frizzle, but I'm taking over!
translation.es: Lo siento, Srta. Rizos, pero tomaré el mando.

translation.en: Arnold, this is another teachable moment.
translation.es: Este es otro momento de aprendizaje.

translation.en: And the lesson is that it wouldn't be safe to challenge a Ballooning Buccaneer.
translation.es: La lección es que es inseguro desafiar al Bucanero del Globo.

translation.en: -I surrender. -[sighs] Thank you.
DA, do whatever you can to get everybody back on the FrizzPad.
translation.es: Gracias. Dorotea… Intenta que todos vuelvan al Rizo-Pad.

translation.en: Right! Already on it!
It's time for a full-scale Frizz Mutiny!
translation.es: ¡Hora de hacer un motín de Rizos!

translation.en: [Arnold] It's up to us...
...to save the day!
-Come on, hand over the whoopee cushion. -[Ms. Frizzle splutters]
Awww, but I need it to teach you a lesson about air pressure!
translation.es: Es para enseñarles sobre la presión del aire.

translation.en: Air currents!
Sorry. We can't have you distracting us right now. There's too much at stake.
translation.es: Lo siento, no podemos distraernos. Hay demasiado en juego.

translation.en: At least let me keep my parachute. Please!
So you can use it to teach us more about how air currents work, right?
translation.es: Para enseñarnos sobre las corrientes aéreas, ¿no?

translation.en: Well, I was going to say because it's awesome, but...
translation.es: Iba a decir que porque es genial…

translation.en: Unacceptable! You can tell Arnold we're good.
translation.es: - ¡Inaceptable! - Dile a Arnoldo que ya está.

translation.en: -[phone beeps] -We've got all of Fiona's daredevil gear. We're distraction-free!
translation.es: Le quitamos todas las distracciones a Fiona.

translation.en: That's great! We sent you info about the Coriolis effect.
translation.es: ¡Genial! Enviamos datos sobre el efecto Coriolis.

translation.en: You should be able to figure out a better path to Albuquerque now!
translation.es: Así encontrarán el camino a Albuquerque.

translation.en: We got it, Arnold.
But it's not like we can just make the balloons go straight to Albuquerque. We can still only go where the air currents are going.
translation.es: Pero no podemos ir directo a Albuquerque, solo podemos seguir las corrientes.

translation.en: Our Frizzles are fading! We have to get them together before they're gone for good!
translation.es: ¡Las Rizos desaparecen! ¡Hay que unirlas antes de que sea tarde!

translation.en: [Keesha] How do we get there fast enough?
Wait a minute!
We keep treating these baskets like they're just hot-air balloon baskets.
translation.es: Actuamos como si solo fueran globos aerostáticos.

translation.en: -But they aren't! -Yes!
They're each part of the Magic School Bus!
And we might have just enough magic left for one last ride!
translation.es: ¡Puede que nos quede magia para un último viaje!

translation.en: If air moves from high pressure to low pressure,
translation.es: Si el aire va de la presión alta a la baja,

translation.en: is there some kind of Bus magic that could create high pressure behind us to push us forward?
translation.es: ¿el autobús no puede crear presión alta detrás para empujarnos?

translation.en: Amazing!
[Ms. Frizzle] Yes! Whoo-hoo!
How did you guys do that? Liz found a lever under the seat.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo hicieron eso? - Una palanca bajo el asiento.

translation.en: Found it!
I can see it! I can see it!
The machine's squeezing the air together into high pressure behind us...
translation.es: La máquina aprieta el aire y sube la presión atrás…

translation.en: [Carlos] And it's spreading the air out into low pressure in front of us.
translation.es: Y esparce el aire y baja la presión adelante.

translation.en: [Ralphie] So the air's rushing from the high pressure to the low pressure!
translation.es: ¡Y el aire va de la presión alta a la baja!

translation.en: We're making our own air currents! And at this speed...
...we might just make it to Albuquerque in time!
-[static crackles] -[Arnold] Here's the plan. We get to Albuquerque, and when we can see each other,
translation.es: El plan: vamos a Albuquerque y, apenas nos veamos,

translation.en: we get our balloons as close together as possible.
translation.es: acercamos los globos todo lo posible.

translation.en: And when we're close enough, we line up the Frizzle fragments.
-[static crackles] -[Ralphie] Arnold?
The Frizz is almost completely gone!
You've reached the voicemail of the Frizz. I'm not here to take your call.
translation.es: Contestador de la Riz. No estoy disponible.

translation.en: -[kids] No! -Just kidding!
Or am I? Am I... am I... am I?
Is she g-g-gone?
Not yet.
There's still some hula left.
-We'll be in Albuquerque soon! -Great news!
translation.es: ¡Falta poco para Albuquerque! ¡Genial! Empezaba a preocuparme un poco.

translation.en: I was starting to get the tiniest bit worried.
Up high!
What happened to our Frizzle fragment? -Is she OK? -[Ms. Frizzle snaps fingers]
I think we're good.
Uh... down low?
We're too late!
Ms. Frizzle is fading away!
Now, now. Keep your head. And I'll keep mine, too.
translation.es: No pierdan la cabeza. Yo tampoco la perderé.

translation.en: Good catch, Dorothy Ann!
Are... are you OK?
I'm perfectly fine, Arnold.
But I don't think the rest of me is coming back this time.
translation.es: Pero creo que, esta vez, el resto no volverá.

translation.en: Arnold, hold Ms. Frizzle for a second.
translation.es: Arnoldo, ten a la señorita Rizos.

translation.en: So, I've been keeping track. Ms. Frizzle's body parts faded and then came back.
translation.es: Registré todo. Sus miembros desaparecieron y volvieron.

translation.en: Then her body faded...
And then came back.
And now her body parts have faded again.
translation.es: Y ahora se fueron sus miembros…

translation.en: And they don't seem to be coming back.
I see a pattern, and if it holds,
translation.es: Veo un patrón. Si se mantiene,

translation.en: we only have 15 minutes to get them back together or Ms. Frizzle is gone for good!
translation.es: tenemos 15 minutos para reunirlas, ¡o desaparecerá para siempre!

translation.en: The FrizzPad is fully back online!
Then let's patch everyone in!
It's good to hear from everyone, but I have unsettling news.
translation.es: Me alegra verlos, pero tengo noticias inquietantes.

translation.en: Besides the fact that we have less than 15 minutes to get our Frizzle fragments back together?
translation.es: ¿Además de que tenemos 15 minutos para reunir a las Rizos?

translation.en: Yes. That storm is still following us!
translation.es: Sí. Esa tormenta aún nos sigue.

translation.en: The air current we created is bringing the storm, too.
translation.es: La corriente que creamos también la trae.

translation.en: What'll happen if it catches up with us?
Just do what you can to stay ahead of it. Time is running out!
translation.es: Intenten ir más rápido. ¡Queda poco tiempo!

translation.en: We're getting near New Mexico, but we have to go faster!
I see the storm that got us into all this trouble in the first place!
translation.es: ¡Veo la tormenta que nos metió en este lío!

translation.en: We'll have to go around it!
But if you put it behind you, what's to say you won't drag it along with you?
translation.es: Pero, si la dejan atrás, quizá la arrastren con ustedes.

translation.en: Uh, guys? What happens if the storms crash together?
translation.es: Pero, si la dejan atrás, quizá la arrastren con ustedes. ¿Qué pasará si las tormentas chocan?

translation.en: I don't see any other choice!
There isn't any time left, and if we want to save Ms. Frizzle, we've got to get past this storm.
translation.es: Para salvar a la Srta. Rizos, debemos pasar esta tormenta.

translation.en: We all have to amp up our currents!
I... I don't think we're going to make it in time!
Arnold!
-[thunder] -I can see you guys! We're almost together!
Grab your Frizzle fragments so we can line them up!
translation.es: Tomen a sus Rizos, así las alineamos.

translation.en: -We're really going to do it! -[Tim] Uh... Jyoti...?
Those storm clouds are getting awfully close!
[Keesha] Just keep ahead of them!
[Arnold] Looks like we're gonna miss each other!
We have to move our pressure systems to turn and swing back around!
translation.es: ¡Hay que mover los sistemas de presión!

translation.en: Now!
Whoa... Wh-What's going on?
According to my research, atmospheric rivers are common,
translation.es: Parece que los ríos atmosféricos son comunes,

translation.en: with as many as six or more present globally at any given time!
translation.es: ¡y puede haber seis o más juntos a la vez!

translation.en: But people don't usually make their own!
We brought a whole bunch of high and low-pressure systems together.
translation.es: Parece que unimos varios sistemas de alta y baja presión.

translation.en: When they start swirling around each other, it will make...
A hurricane!
[DA] Hurricanes happen at sea! And this is over land, so technically it's...
translation.es: ¡Los huracanes son en el mar! Estamos en tierra, así que sería…

translation.en: a tornado!
-Very good, DA. -[tornado rumbles]
[Arnold] Hang on, everyone!
Help!
Only 30 seconds left. This is it!
Don't give up!
Hold on to your Frizzle fragments! We can do this!
Come on, come on!
-[sparks sizzle] -Arnold! Look! Look!
[Arnold] Ms. Frizzle!
[Tim] It's working!
[Keesha] You did it, Arnold! We did it!
Just in time for us to go down in a tornado!
translation.es: ¡Justo a tiempo para caer en un tornado!

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] Would you look at that pressure system?
[kids] Ms. Frizzle!
Yup, it's me! Reunited at last.
And it feels...
Turbulent!
I was going to say magical, but sure. Here we go!
translation.es: Iba a decir "mágico", pero sí. ¡Allá vamos!

translation.en: OK, class. We need to counter what caused this storm. Thoughts?
translation.es: Hay que contrarrestar el origen de la tormenta. ¿Ideas?

translation.en: Could we switch the high and low-pressure areas?
translation.es: ¿Ir a zonas de alta y baja presión?

translation.en: Interesting.
[Jyoti] Right now the air from the high-pressure areas keeps trying to move to the low-pressure areas.
translation.es: El aire de las zonas de alta presión quiere ir a las de baja presión.

translation.en: It's pushing the air around and around in a circle.
translation.es: Hace que el aire dé vueltas sin parar.

translation.en: I get it! But if we reverse the areas of the high and low pressure,
translation.es: Pero, si revirtiéramos las zonas de alta y baja presión,

translation.en: then the air would start moving the opposite way.
translation.es: quizá el aire se movería al revés.

translation.en: And slow the tornado down. Or maybe even stop it!
translation.es: Y ralentizaría al tornado. ¡O podría detenerlo!

translation.en: No one's ever tried this before, but I'm pretty sure no one's ever had to!
translation.es: Nadie lo ha intentado, pero ¡nunca hizo falta!

translation.en: Well then, let's take a chance!
Seat belts, everyone!
We can do it, Ms. Frizzle! I know we can!
We wouldn't be doing anything if you hadn't gotten me back together, Arnold.
translation.es: No lograríamos nada si no me hubieras ayudado.

translation.en: I'm super ready to stop spinning now! [groans]
translation.es: ¡Ya estoy listo para dejar de girar!

translation.en: Almost there. Hold tight!
And one last little trick.
Just a little low pressure in the distance
to send the storm away from the Balloon Fiesta.
translation.es: para alejar la tormenta del Festival de Globos.

translation.en: -[Bus honks] -Ms. Frizzle, welcome back!
translation.es: para alejar la tormenta del Festival de Globos. ¡Srta. Rizos! ¡Bienvenida!

translation.en: And in one piece, not three!
translation.es: Y en una pieza, no tres.

translation.en: Ahhh, it's good to be back!
I owe some of you a big thanks for laughing at my jokes,
translation.es: Gracias por reírse de mis chistes,

translation.en: some others for saving me from a waterfall,
and I think I owe a couple of you grades on balloon work!
translation.es: y estas son sus notas de la tarea para el globo.

translation.en: -It's still your birthday trip, Arnold. -What do you want to do now?
translation.es: Aún es tu cumpleaños, Arnoldo. - ¿Qué quieres hacer? - Algo en tierra, espero.

translation.en: -Something on the ground, I hope. -[kids laugh]
translation.es: - ¿Qué quieres hacer? - Algo en tierra, espero.

translation.en: Yeah, Arnold. I bet you're ready to head home and stay there!
translation.es: Arnoldo, seguro quieres meterte en tu casa.

translation.en: Actually... let's go where the wind takes us.
translation.es: De hecho, vayamos adonde nos lleve el viento.

translation.en: Good call, Arnold!
-Yeah. The Balloon Fiesta is awesome! -Stunning!
translation.es: - Sí, ¡el Festival de Globos es genial! - ¡Deslumbrante!

translation.en: [Keesha] Look at all those balloons riding the air currents.
translation.es: Miren esos globos en las corrientes de aire.

translation.en: From high pressure to low stress.
translation.es: De alta presión a bajo estrés.

translation.en: [sighs] Oh, this is truly gorgeous.
I should really take a group picture.
Hey, everybody get together!
-Now smile! -[camera clicks]
That's the problem with these pineapple phones.
The reception's fine, but the camera is awful.
translation.es: Buena señal, pero muy mala cámara.

translation.en: I've never felt so...
alive! Whoo-hoo!
-[beeps] -Fiona Frizzle here, currently available to answer questions!
translation.es: Fiona Rizos, lista para responder preguntas.

translation.en: [kid] Hey, Ms. Frizzle! Hot-air balloons are amazing!
translation.es: Srta. Rizos, los globos aerostáticos son geniales.

translation.en: Can I take one back and forth to school every day?
translation.es: ¿Puedo ir en globo a la escuela?

translation.en: I love the way you think, kid.
But remember, there's no way to steer a balloon
other than by adjusting the altitude to catch different air currents.
translation.es: Pero recuerda, solo puedes conducirlo adaptando la altitud para montar corrientes.

translation.en: There aren't any brakes on a hot-air balloon either.
[chuckles] That's my kind of aircraft!
You'll need to know the wind speed and direction both on the ground and where it was...
translation.es: Necesitas saber la velocidad del viento, la dirección en tierra y…

translation.en: [laughs] Gotcha!
[chuckles] This is funny!
Some balloon pilots even release a helium balloon
translation.es: Algunos sueltan globos de helio para ver qué pasa,

translation.en: to see what happens to it as it goes up, but I like my version better!
translation.es: Algunos sueltan globos de helio para ver qué pasa, pero ¡yo prefiero mi versión!

translation.en: Hey, how's the weather up there?
I'll tell you when I get down!
-[laughs] Nice catch! -Thank you.
[kid] There's no way they could have made it from Hawaii, Peru, and Nova Scotia
translation.es: Es imposible ir de Hawái, Perú y Nueva Escocia

translation.en: to Albuquerque in the same day!
That's true. We used a little Bus magic to get everyone together in time.
translation.es: Cierto. Usamos magia del autobús para reunirnos a tiempo.

translation.en: Without Bus magic, a balloon's speed is as changeable as the wind.
translation.es: Sin eso, la velocidad del globo cambia con el viento.

translation.en: But these babies can move fast!
You can take one all the way around the world in just over 11 days!
translation.es: ¡Puedes dar la vuelta al mundo en solo 11 días!

translation.en: Ehhh! Over there!
-Got your phone! -Nice one!
[kid] One last question.
How exactly did the class create a tornado when they were reuniting?
translation.es: ¿cómo hicieron para crear un tornado cuando se reunieron?

translation.en: And what is a tornado anyway? Just a big storm?
translation.es: ¿Y qué es un tornado? ¿Una tormenta grande?

translation.en: Remember, each of the three...
Each of the three balloons had high pressure behind it
translation.es: Cada globo tenía presión alta atrás

translation.en: and low pressure areas leading the way.
[The Frizz] Yeah!
And when all of those high and low pressure areas got together,
translation.es: Y, cuando se juntaron todas esas zonas,

translation.en: it made the perfect conditions for a whirling, swirling,
low-pressure storm called a cyclone, baby!
translation.es: para una tormenta giratoria de baja presión: ¡un ciclón!

translation.en: It just depends on where the storm takes place.
translation.es: Depende de dónde se dé la tormenta.

translation.en: Storms on the ocean are hurricanes or monsoons; storms over land are tornadoes.
translation.es: Si es en el mar, son huracanes o monzones. En tierra, tornados.

translation.en: [kid] Whatever it was, it was very cool! Thanks, Ms. Frizzle.
translation.es: Fuera lo que fuera, fue genial. ¡Gracias!

translation.en: [all three] You're welcome!
Goodbye, now!
-[horn honks] -[Ms. Frizzle] Seat belts, everyone!
[Arnold] Please let this be a normal field trip!
-[Wanda] With the Frizz? -[kids] No way!
♪ Oh, cruising on down Main Street ♪ ♪ You're relaxed and feeling good ♪
translation.es: Caminando por la calle, vas sintiéndote muy bien.

translation.en: ♪ Next thing that you know ♪
-♪ You're seeing... ♪ -[Ms. Frizzle] Whoo-hooo!
♪ Octopus in the neighborhood! ♪
♪ Surfing on a soundwave ♪
-♪ Or swinging through the stars ♪ -Yee-ha!
♪ Take a left at your intestine ♪ ♪ Take your second right past Mars ♪
translation.es: Dando vuelta en una vena, ¡hasta Marte llegarás!

translation.en: ♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Navigate a nostril ♪ -[Ralphie sneezes]
♪ Climb on the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Spank a plankton, too ♪ -[Wanda] Take that!
♪ On our Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Raft a river of lava ♪
♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Such a fine thing to do ♪
♪ So strap your bones right to the seat ♪
♪ Come on in and don't be shy ♪
♪ Just to make your day complete ♪
♪ You might get baked into a pie ♪
♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Step in, step in, step inside ♪
♪ It's a wilder ride, come on! ♪
♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus! ♪
